column3: Not sure if these should be removed or documented.

This PR as of 074405ad1ded63d1ba83518f458fde61cfd220f5 isn't really doing the right thing. The rpcdump methods are supposed to trigger "This type of wallet does not support this command" errors when called on descriptor wallets where `CWallet::GetLegacyScriptPubKeyMan` returns null (in the future after 4d0e6f063e34d3869f89d410ccdc4b6255a00150 from #17261).\n\nTo clean this up I would rename the
Thank you @ryanofsky for your feedback. Will do and look into PR #17261.

> This PR as of 074405a isn't really doing the right thing.

FWIW this is exactly what I warned about in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17300#issuecomment-548747261 :smile: 
But yes, might be better to just wait for @ryanofsky's follow up on this.
Heh, I suspected as much. Closing rather than following up, then.
